column4: i just download and isntalled ubuntu and after booting when gdm started i could only see squars on the screen.. there was no error and i heard the sound of the login screen.. can anyone give me a help?
can anyone help me on this please?
try ctrl-alt-backspace. It will kill the X server and drop you to a text login prompt.
it will start gmd again, but i have prompt access with ctrl alt f1
